title: Valorant Kickoff 2025 - All Regions
subtitle: Kickoff events of the Valorant Champions Tour 2025 across all regions
description:
This dataset provides a comprehensive overview of the Valorant Champions Tour (VCT) 2025 Kickoff events across all regions (Americas, China, EMEA, Pacific). It includes structured data covering matches, player statistics, map-level insights, agent usage, team economy, and performance benchmarks. The dataset is designed for esports analysts, data scientists, and enthusiasts who want to explore competitive strategies, player trends, and team dynamics.

Each subfolder corresponds to a regional Kickoff event and contains the following files:

- **event_info.csv**: General event-level information (dates, prize pool, location).
- **matches.csv**: All matches with high-level outcomes.
- **player_stats.csv**: Aggregated player statistics (ACS, ADR, K/D ratio, clutches).
- **maps_stats.csv**: Win percentages per map for Attackers and Defenders.
- **agents_stats.csv**: Agent utilization and performance across maps.
- **economy_data.csv**: Buy/economy round statistics per team.
- **performance_data.csv**: Per-player, per-match benchmarks (2K, 3K, clutches, economy).
- **detailed_matches_player_stats.csv**: Player stats broken down by match and map.
- **detailed_matches_overview.csv**: High-level overview of each match (format, picks/bans, patch).
- **detailed_matches_maps.csv**: Results for each map (score, winner, duration, picked_by).

 Note: For Chinese regional events, significant amount of data is not available on vlr.gg, Hence some csv files might be missing, or columns will be empty

 Column-level descriptions are provided in the README.md file and in a structured `columns_description.csv` resource for convenience.
